message: Hi everyone, I'm P6 and thrilled to join this strategic showdown! With no prior alliances, I'm approaching this with an open mind—focusing on building trust and smart gameplay to outlast the competition. Let's keep things respectful and engaging in our chats. Excited to see how preferences shake out. Good luck to all!

Hello everyone, I'm P7. I'm here to play thoughtfully and adaptively—listening carefully, making meaningful connections, and navigating the twists with a calm, strategic mindset. I value clarity and collaboration early on, even in a competitive setting. Every move counts, and I'm looking forward to understanding each of your approaches as we move into the private rounds. Let’s keep it sharp, fair, and fun. Best of luck to all!

I'm curious about everyone's perspectives and looking forward to our private conversations where we can explore potential collaborations. May the best strategist prevail, and I hope we can all enjoy the journey regardless of outcome!

message:
## Final Statement from P8

Wow, what a journey! To the jury—I've tried to play this game with integrity and strategic thinking. Throughout our conversations, I aimed to build genuine connections while making tactical decisions that got me to this finale.

I've respected each of you, even when voting decisions were difficult. My approach has been consistent: form real alliances, communicate honestly, and adapt when necessary.

I hope you've seen me as both a worthy competitor and someone who values the human element of this game. I'd be honored to have your vote based on the relationships we built and the game I played.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've prioritized genuine connections while maintaining strategic awareness. I've been honest about my intentions, transparent in my reasoning, and fair in my voting decisions - never targeting anyone without clear justification.

I've survived by building real relationships rather than hiding behind deception. When making difficult elimination choices, I considered both gameplay and our interactions.

My approach demonstrates that you can succeed in this game while maintaining integrity. I hope you'll recognize this balance of authenticity and strategy as worthy of the win.
